Flash.description: Blinks your champion a short distance toward your cursor.
conditions: Cannot be used while rooted, grounded, or suppressed.
Can be used while stunned or silenced, but has no effect until they wear off.
Cannot be used while channeling; will cast after the channel completes.

Ignite.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing true damage over 5 seconds and applying Grievous Wounds.
conditions: Target must be a champion.
Applies Grievous Wounds for 5 seconds.
Can be used during crowd control.

Smite.description: Deals true damage to jungle monsters or minions. Upgrades after usage to empower healing and slow champions.
conditions: Primarily used on jungle monsters. Used in conjunction with jungle item that staarts with 40 stacks.
Jungle item upgrades automatically after reducing jungle item stacks to 20  - 900 true damage smite after first upgrade.
Jungle item upgrades automatically and clears from inventory after all stacks are gone (typically 40 cammps cleared) - 1200 true damage smite to monsters
Can slow enemy champions after upgrade.

Ghost.description: Gain bonus movement speed and phase through units for 15 seconds. Takedowns extend duration.
conditions: Can be cast while crowd controlled.
Speed bonus ramps over time.
Takedowns extend duration by 7 seconds.

Exhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their movement speed and damage dealt for 3 seconds.
conditions: Target must be a champion.
Reduces damage dealt by 40% and movement speed by 30%.
Can be used while crowd controlled.

Heal.description: Restores health to your champion and an ally, and grants bonus movement speed for 1 second.
conditions: Heals both you and the lowest-health nearby ally.
Healing is halved for targets recently affected by Heal.
Applies a brief movement speed boost.
Only affects yourself.
Shield scales with level.
Can be used while crowd controlled.

Cleanse.description: Removes all crowd control debuffs (except airborne effects) and reduces incoming CC duration for 3 seconds.
conditions: Does not remove knock-ups, knockbacks, or suppression.
Removes slows, roots, stuns, taunts, fears, charms, polymorphs, blinds, and silence.
Can be cast while crowd controlled (except suppressed/airborne).

Teleport.description: Channels for 4 seconds to teleport to an allied tower, minion, or ward. Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport after 10 minutes.
conditions: Interruptible during the channel.
Unleashed version can target wards and towers.
Has a delay before arrival (3.5s to 4s depending on upgrade).
